name: Benjamin Fairchild
summary:
Benjamin Fairchild is a 33-year-old Medical Researcher based in Los Angeles, California. He is a graduate from Yale University. While he hails from Seattle, Washington, he is fluent in both English and Spanish. Benjamin values open-mindedness, work-life balance, compassion, and creativity. His interests include travelling, hiking, and reading.

In terms of beliefs, Benjamin is agnostic and politically moderate. He is looking for a serious, long-term relationship and is open to monogamy. He identifies as a straight man and uses he/him/his pronouns. Benjamin is of White Caucasian ethnicity, doesn't have children but wants to in future, and is a proud dog owner.

His zodiac sign is Leo and his MBTI personality type is INTJ. He drinks occasionally, but he doesn’t smoke or indulge in marijuana or drugs. Being an active individual, he also values exercise.

In his potential partner, Benjamin prefers a straight woman between 27 to 37 years old who enjoys an active lifestyle. He would prefer a non-smoker who likes to drink occasionally. She should also not have, but want children in future.
